summary: An evil Chinese mastermind plots to freeze the Earth's oceans.
cast: Christopher Lee|Richard Greene|Howard Marion-Crawford|Günther Stoll|Rosalba Neri|Maria Perschy|José Manuel Martín|Werner Abrolat|Tsai Chin|Stanley Baker|Dirk Bogarde|Mike Brendel|David de Keyser|Jesús Franco|Herbert Fux|Osvaldo Genazzani|Burt Kwouk|Gustavo Re|Gene Reyes|Robert Rietty|Moisés Augusto Rocha
title: El castillo de Fu-Manchu
